name: Shot in the Dark (itch) (Josh Finkel)
description:
This is a game that I made in one week by myself in May 2020 for my Intro to Game Development class.

Goal:

Shoot as many ghosts as you can before the time runs out.
Watch out, because the ghosts will shoot back at you.
Some ghosts will give you powerups.
Collect the coins that the ghosts drop when you kill them.


Controls:

Use the left and right arrow keys to aim.
Use the A and D keys to move left and right to collect coins.
Press the space bar to shoot.
Press shift to activate a powerup.

The game's background music is by Mickael Blum: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bAsMazCV47I
